1) Before writing a paper, review some good papers published by well established and reputed authors.

 2) The title should clearly reflect motive of the research.

 3) Primer contributor should be the first author.

 4) The co-authors should be on the basis of amount of their contribution in the work.

 5) Carefully check your paper or work for 

 6) Collect the references on which the work is based for the proper citation of the paper.

 7) Add figures which should be explanatory and convey clear distributions in the paper.

 8) While using the graphs grid should be light in color with clear variable distribution and scale.

 9) While writing the paper equation is the most important segment of the paper. Therefore while writing equations one should use proper symbols with local definition of the symbols.

 10) The derivations which are necessary should be induced briefly in the appendix.

 11) Organize all the points in detail and in proper sequence

 12) Abstract should completely focus on work.

 13) The introduction should denote the general importance of your work and the overview of preliminaries of the research.

 14) Next step defines the contribution of the past work with the reference of the past work on which your work is based.

 15) Finally the results and significance of the work will be discussed in conclusion.

 16) An acknowledgement should be included after conclusion if you have taken help from others to complete your work.

 17) After writing the full draft, iterate it several times for improvement and to give final touch for polishing of written English.
